name: Xero
natural_language_description: 这是 Xero 节点。主要用于: Consume Xero API

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: invoice
available_options: Contact (值: contact)
Invoice (值: invoice)
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: create
available_options: Create (值: create) - Create a invoice
Get (值: get) - Get a invoice
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many invoices
Update (值: update) - Update a invoice
Custom API Call (值: __CUSTOM_API_CALL__)

organizationId.name: organizationId
organizationId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
organizationId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Organization Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Full name of contact/organisation | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: brandingThemeId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
currency (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
currencyRate (值: None) - The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.
date (值: None) - Date invoice was issued - YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation.
dueDate (值: None) - Date invoice is due - YYYY-MM-DD
expectedPaymentDate (值: None) - Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set
invoiceNumber (值: None)
lineAmountType (值: None)
plannedPaymentDate (值: None) - Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set
reference (值: None) - ACCREC only - additional reference number (max length = 255)
sendToContact (值: None) - Whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved.
status (值: None)
url (值: None) - URL link to a source document - shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

contactId.name: contactId
contactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Contact ID | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 100

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: createdByMyApp (值: None) - Whether you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app
orderBy (值: None) - Order by any element returned
sortOrder (值: None)
statuses (值: None)
where (值: None) - The where parameter allows you to filter on endpoints and elements that don't have explicit parameters. Examples Here.

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: brandingThemeId (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
contactId (值: None)
currency (值: None) - Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
currencyRate (值: None) - The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.
date (值: None) - Date invoice was issued - YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation.
dueDate (值: None) - Date invoice is due - YYYY-MM-DD
expectedPaymentDate (值: None) - Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set
invoiceNumber (值: None)
lineAmountType (值: None)
lineItemsUi (值: None) - Line item data
plannedPaymentDate (值: None) - Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set
reference (值: None) - ACCREC only - additional reference number (max length = 255)
sendToContact (值: None) - Whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as "sent". This can be set only on invoices that have been approved.
status (值: None)
url (值: None) - URL link to a source document - shown as "Go to [appName]" in the Xero app

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Invoice Type | (必填项)
available_options: Bill (值: ACCPAY) - Accounts Payable or supplier invoice
Sales Invoice (值: ACCREC) - Accounts Receivable or customer invoice

lineItemsUi.name: lineItemsUi
lineItemsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Line Items | 作用: Line item data | 默认值: {}
available_options: lineItemsValues (值: None)

invoiceId.name: invoiceId
invoiceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Invoice ID | (必填项)
